plot: A cut-out animation put to Marge Piercy's poem "A Work of Artifice" illustrates the power of words to shape living creatures.
title: The Bonsai Tree
plot_es: A cut-out animation put to Marge Piercy's poem "A Work of Artifice" illustrates the power of words to shape living creatures.
plot_en: A cut-out animation put to Marge Piercy's poem "A Work of Artifice" illustrates the power of words to shape living creatures.
